name: Zortron
description:
In this never ending space shooter you must avoid attacks from alien spacecraft while dodging asteroids and space debris, all while trying to get as high a score as possible.

A simple arcade style space shooter based off of a tutorial by Thomas Palef, which can be found at http://www.lessmilk.com/tutorial/space-shooter-unity-1.

Music for this endeavor was made by Kevin Macleod, at incompetech.com and the music is under the Creative Commons by Attribution v. 3.0 License.

Change Log v1.0:

  • Fixed moving spaceship to edges of screen
  • Added more enemy intelligence
  • Added powerups to give more lives
